title: Fabrication of a ternary biocomposite film based on polyvinyl alcohol, cellulose nanocrystals, and silver nanoparticles for food packaging
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18671-18684
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02085E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Long Hoang Nguyen, Trang Thanh Tran, Thanh-My Thi Nguyen, Hieu Van Le, Kim-Phung Le Nguyen, An Nang Vu
Silver nanoparticles (AgNPs) were loaded on deprotonated cellulose nanocrystals (CNCd) and incorporated into polyvinyl alcohol (PVA) to develop novel active food packaging films.
